TITLE: Episode 52 - The Odd Vixens In
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie sit down with Oddman from “ The Oddcast: featuring the Oddman Out”. They discuss scientism and how it’s become the new religion and how even with mountains of research many people will not change their minds.
